info.name: Go Newsletter API
info.description:
API for the Go Newsletter platform. Enables registered users (Editors)  
to curate and publish their own newsletters that other users (Subscribers) can subscribe to.  
Supports immediate and scheduled publishing, and admin functionalities.

request.description: Register a new editor. Supabase Auth handles the actual user creation.

response.name: Signup successful, session returned (or user object)

item.name: List Published Posts for a Newsletter

request.description: Retrieves a list of published posts for a specific newsletter. Requires editor ownership. This lists *already published* posts.

response.name: A list of published posts.

item.name: Publish or Schedule a New Post to Newsletter

request.description: Creates a new post. If `scheduled_at` is provided, the post is scheduled; otherwise, it's published immediately. Requires editor ownership.

response.name: Post published successfully.
